databaseConfig.sql:
select MS_USER_PASS_HIS_ID, MS_USER_ID , PASSWORD , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , TS , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID
from MS_USER_PASS_HIS where MS_USER_ID = :MS_USER_ID
order by RENEW_DATE desc

select max(RENEW_DATE) as RENEW_DATE
from MS_USER_PASS_HIS where MS_USER_ID = :MS_USER_ID

insert into MS_USER_PASS_HIS( MS_USER_PASS_HIS_ID, MS_USER_ID , PASSWORD , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID) values( :MS_USER_PASS_HIS_ID, :MS_USER_ID , :PASSWORD , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID)
